body:
This unit test fails with MariaDB 10.2, 10.3 specifically.

```
1213 19:15:52.865727   26198 server.go:320] Cannot read post-SSL client handshake response from client 1 ([::1]:42178): tls: client didn't provide a certificate
io.ReadFull(header size) failed
W1213 19:15:52.866317   26198 auth_server_static.go:195] Config parsed using legacy configuration. Please update to the latest format: {"user":[{"Password": "xxx"}, ...]}
W1213 19:15:53.986673   26198 server.go:363] Error authenticating user using MySQL native password: Access denied for user 'user1' (errno 1045) (sqlstate 28000)
W1213 19:15:53.987158   26198 server.go:363] Error authenticating user using MySQL native password: Access denied for user 'user1' (errno 1045) (sqlstate 28000)
W1213 19:15:53.993871   26198 server.go:451] Slow connection from client 1 (127.0.0.1:56744): 138.801µs
E1213 19:15:54.002254   26198 server.go:273] mysql_server caught panic:
test panic attack!
/home/runner/work/vitess/vitess/go/mysql/server_flaky_test.go:93 (0x8931fd)
	io/vitess/go/mysql.(*testHandler).ComQuery: panic("test panic attack!")
/home/runner/work/vitess/vitess/go/mysql/conn.go:1070 (0x8326b7)
	io/vitess/go/mysql.(*Conn).execQuery: err := handler.ComQuery(c, query, func(qr *sqltypes.Result) error {
/home/runner/work/vitess/vitess/go/mysql/conn.go:771 (0x831f31)
	io/vitess/go/mysql.(*Conn).handleNextCommand: if err := c.execQuery(sql, handler, more); err != nil {
/home/runner/work/vitess/vitess/go/mysql/server.go:458 (0x850936)
	io/vitess/go/mysql.(*Listener).handle: err := c.handleNextCommand(l.handler)
/opt/hostedtoolcache/go/1.12.14/x64/src/runtime/asm_amd64.s:1337 (0x45e880)
	goexit: BYTE	$0x90	// NOP
E1213 19:15:54.021808   26198 conn.go:1117] Error in the middle of a stream to client 5 (127.0.0.1:56752): forced error after send (errno 1047) (sqlstate 08S01)
W1213 19:15:54.051863   26198 server.go:363] Error authenticating user using MySQL native password: Access denied for user 'user1' (errno 1045) (sqlstate 28000)
W1213 19:15:54.056368   26198 server.go:363] Error authenticating user using MySQL native password: Access denied for user 'user2' (errno 1045) (sqlstate 28000)


--- FAIL: TestClearTextServer (0.01s)
##[error]    server_flaky_test.go:202: listening on address '127.0.0.1' port 46161
##[error]    server_flaky_test.go:1202: Running mysql command: /usr/bin/mysql [-v -v -v -e select rows -h 127.0.0.1 -P 46161 -u user1 -ppassword1]
##[error]    server_flaky_test.go:762: mysql should have failed but returned: --------------
        select rows
        --------------
        
        +------+------------+
        | id   | name       |
        +------+------------+
        |   10 | nice name  |
        |   20 | nicer name |
        +------+------------+
        2 rows in set (0.000 sec)
        
        Bye
FAIL
FAIL	vitess.io/vitess/go/mysql	2.638s
```
title: Failing Unit Test: vitess.io/vitess/go/mysql with MariaDB 10.2, 10.3
